isis.stitle: DT/DTI-466 A and B Series DT/DTI/DTA-466 C Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1993) - ENGINE DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS - CREATIVE TOOL MODEL CT-400 DIESEL TIMING AND TACHOMETER INSTRUMENT [SE-2783] OR [3005] EARLIER MODEL

svcsubsec.title: CREATIVE TOOL MODEL CT-400 DIESEL TIMING AND TACHOMETER INSTRUMENT [SE-2783] OR [3005] EARLIER MODEL

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para:
The diesel timing and tachometer instrument (Figure 4.5)
is a solid state electronic instrument used to dynamically measure fuel injection pump timing and automatic advance in degrees. This instrument also reads engine RPM from cranking to high idle speeds. The 14 mm Split-Nut Transducer is used for DT/DTI-466 A and B Series Diesel Engines with UTDS Model 100 Fuel Injection Pumps. The 14 mm In-Line Transducer is used for the DT/DTI/DTA-466 C Diesel Engines with Robert Bosch "MW" and "A" Fuel Injection Pumps.
